content: cute little baby jacket - perfect for boy or girl premature babies very quick & easy to knit dk yarn 8ply 4mm needles small preemie only requires 32g medium preemie - 38g large preemie - 50g newborn size - 58g matching hats also available perfect for charity knitting - and it s free **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
